summary: This is a mod that re-textures steel into black steel!
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that re-textures steel into black steel! Please look at the screenshots to decide between the regular handles and the black handles!

===Please Read===
If you want Black handles along with Black steel please download the Black Steel and Black Handles file instead of the original! 

===INSTALL===
Just place the texture folder into your Steam>Steamapps>Common>Skyrim>Data folder and merge and replace everything! 

===INPORTANT===
If you also want Black Iron! Download my Black Iron - Weapons mod here!

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3396


===OTHER===
Please view the screenshots! And check out my Skyrim videos and subscribe on Youtube! 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HVsxBY57SZk&context=C2daf6ADOEgsToPDskKPgF31HYEo7TH2A1XQP0qS
author: kclimer13
